titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of Transportation, under the Strategic Highway Research Program, to expend $5,000,000 for an asphalt research program.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

bill.summary: 10/18/1988--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of Transportation to expend a specified amount of funds appropriated to the Highway Trust Fund in order to implement an asphalt research program by the Western Research Institute at an existing pilot plant capable of processing bitumen-bearing ore using a methodology that provides environmentally acceptable clean tailings.
